CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Lipella Pharmaceuticals Inc., a clinical-stage biotechnology company, focuses on developing drugs by reformulating the active agents in existing generic drugs and optimizing these reformulations for various applications. It is developing LP-10, a formulation of tacrolimus that is in Phase IIa clinical trial for patients with radiation-induced hemorrhagic cystitis; and LP-310, a formulation of tacrolimus for the treatment of oral lichen planus. Lipella Pharmaceuticals Inc. was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
